result.name: active-people-survey-interactive-tool
result.notes:
Active People Survey (APS) is a national survey of sports participation which reports at the national, demographic and local level. The survey is an official statistic and has been running since 2005

Active People Interactive is an interactive web tool which allows users to query the APS datasets (2006-2013)
result.title: Active People survey interactive tool

extras.value:
Active People Interactive will be available at http://activepeople.sportengland.org/ and will be updated with each survey wave (ie after June and December each year)

The APS dataset is available to download on the UK data archive (http://data-archive.ac.uk/sign-up login and access restrictions apply - APS is currently freely available to education, not for profit and public sector organisations)
